model

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Piece

  • public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represent a single piece in the chess game

      • Piece

                Piece.Type type,
                Piece.Color color,
                Board board)
        Constructor of the piece
        Parameters:
        position - Starting position of the piece
        type - Type of the piece BISHOP, KING, KNIGHT, PAWN, QUEEN, ROOK
        color - White or Black
        board - Reference to the board where the piece is placed
